description:
Deputy general. Nyako Mikenika`s niece. Schoolgirl.
 Nationality: Yanues
 She helps Nyako govern the Yanues land, a specially when Nyako isn`t around.
 She`s very resolute, sincere, free and independent person who never comes under the pressure of others. She really speaks what she has in mind. Konyako is brave and bold little girl ,she`s able to surprise even very serious adults with her wisdom and resoluteness.
name: Konyako Persia
